participant_1.background:
I'm usually too busy with school work to keep up with my family, but I try my best.
my hobbies are sleeping and playing the guitar.
i am going to school to get my bachelors degree.
I live in a small apartment with my cat Charlie, but I dream of having a house with a big yard so they can run around.
it s great fun.

participant_2.background:
I don't care about my height because I am comfortable with who I am.
i like to donate time at the local animal shelter.
I don't have any siblings, but I've been doing some research on how to help my dog with his behavioral issues.
I miss the days of being a kid, but I'm trying to make the best of my current situation.
I'm going to make my grandson a chocolate cake and brew a batch of beer.

content.text: Hey there! How is your evening going?
Hey! I'm doing pretty well, thanks for asking. How about yours?
It's going well. I'm just hanging out with my cat, Charlie.
Aww, that sounds nice. I don't have any pets, but I like to donate time at the local animal shelter.
That's great! I'm sure the animals appreciate it.
I hope so! I'm doing some research on how to help my dog with his behavioral issues.
Oh, that's tough. I hope you're able to find a solution.
Thanks. I'm trying to make the best of my current situation.
I'm sure you'll figure it out. You seem like a smart person.
No problem! What are your plans for the weekend?
I'm going to make my grandson a chocolate cake and brew a batch of beer.
That sounds fun! I love chocolate cake.
Me too! It's my favorite dessert.
What kind of beer are you brewing?
I'm not sure yet. I'm thinking about doing an IPA.
Oh, good! We should have a beer tasting sometime.
